Capillariasis: 
PO- 
Adults and Children >= 2 years: 200 mg  twice daily for 10 days. ', '
Cutaneous larva migrans: 
PO- 
Adults: 400mg once daily for 3 days. ', '
Children: 5 mg/kg/day for 3 days. ', '
Giardiasis: 
PO- 
Adults: 400 mg once daily for 3 days. ', '

Trichinosis: 
PO- 
Adults: 400 mg twice daily for 15 days. ', '
Trichostrongyliasis: 
PO- 
Adults: 400 mg  as a single dose.
